pageContext.claim: “I saw one poll, 62 percent of the people said they were lying about the polls.”
pageContext.analysis: Ironically Trump is citing a poll to offer this statistic. But the poll merely asked whether people thought other people were being truthful in polls. Another survey found that roughly 11 percent of Republican voters and 10 percent of independent voters said they would not report their true opinions about their preferred presidential candidate on telephone polls.
